content.body: dminor: Is there a tracking bug for https://github.com/tc39/proposal-regexp-modifiers, which is at Stage 3? I cannot find one on https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/.

content.body: msaboff: Do you know if JSC has a tracking bug for RegExp Modifiers yet, I also cannot find one on https://bugs.webkit.org/

content.body:
We now have 26 folk signed up for February San Diego meeting. So it's on track to be the biggest meeting since 2019.

The advertised deadline for registrations is Friday 19th January 2024 - so if you plan on coming please sign up soon!
https://github.com/tc39/Reflector/issues/516

content.body: should be 27 now--see you all there!
